    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LayoutRendererConstraints(int preferedheight, java.lang.Class<?> layout)
      construct a LayoutRendererConstraints, that has the same feature than a RendererConstraints except that he can get a layout manager for the Popup Menu

    • Constructor Detail

      • LayoutRendererConstraints

        public LayoutRendererConstraints(int preferedheight,
                                 java.lang.Class<?> layout)
        construct a LayoutRendererConstraints, that has the same feature than a RendererConstraints except that he can get a layout manager for the Popup Menu
        Parameters:
        preferedheight - the preferred height of element inherit RendererConstraints
        layout - the class of the LayoutManager it will construct by his default constructor any LayoutManager that didn't satisfy this condition will throw an IllegalArgumentException
